channel.title: My weird vlog
channel.description: Recent content on My weird vlog

item.title: About
item.description:
About me

Who the fuck am I?

I am a weird guy that has a doubtable fascination of having the control of everything. Thus I am aimed to be an embedded systems engineer focusing on biomedical engineering because I wanted to be a biologist and a scientist when I was a kid but my parents fucked up everything as it’s tradition.

I like to make things, I don’t like to take courses because in my geography happen that the teachers on technology subjects are stupid boomers with no idea about what they are doing. Note that my country has an educative system that award the ignorance and summision over knowledge and skills. If you happen to see skilled people is always on boring stuff focused on making short term money. You would think that is ok if they need it, but even on abundance they do the same.

item.title: 001 Start
item.description:
The beggining of my vlog

Idk what to sayl I’m just starting this Hugo website because I have so much to say and there is so much absence of smart people in my life that I need somewhere to share my coding adventures and talking shit about windows, web dev, stupid people, VS code users, platform IO users, internet users, oxygen users and so, like a Twitter but actually interesting and with bit manipulation included and a superiority condition that u cannot claim to be false.
